name: Dicescape!
description:
Roll The Dice and See Your Fate!

Dicescape is a solo RPG where you roll dice to defeat, talk, or run from enemies. The evil king has trapped you and has forced you to fight him and his goons! Challenge these brave and dastardly warriors before going head to head with the king himself! But whatever you do...

DON'T GET SHAKEN UP!

Notes:

  1. This was made for the GMTK Game Jam for 2022.
  2. The game does use controller support. If there is an HTML build, it might be  a bit finicky...
  3. The character is a die.
  4. This game is a little difficult...
  5. The soundtrack is original. Check it out here: https://soundcloud.com/axxessgamez/sets/dicescape-ost?utm_source=clipboard&utm_m...
  6. Yeah, that's it.
CONTROLS: ACCEPTLEFTRIGHTENTER/SPACE

DualShock Cross(PlayStation), A Button (X-Box), B Button (Nintendo)

LEFT ARROW KEY

LEFT D-PAD
RIGHT ARROW KEY

RIGHT D-PAD
CREDITS:

Art: Tob

Programmer: Tob

Dialog: Trace

Music: Trace

Game Design: Tob and Trace

  • If YOU COULD RATE THE GAME, IT WOULD MEAN A LOT! THANKS :)
